meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of the New Kensington-Arnold School District, a vibrant and inviting centerpiece of the community, is to ensure that each student is prepared, inspired, and motivated to be a successful contributing citizen of an ever-evolving global society by engaging and challenging students with personalized instruction, teaching excellence, innovative technology, and high expectations for superior academic achievement while embracing our unique traditions, heritage, and diversity in a safe, nurturing, student-centered environment.

figcaption.p: Officer assists student at annual 4th grade Fishing Derby

img.alt: Superintendent Pallone visits with Ms. Heavner's first grade students

figcaption.p: Superintendent Pallone visits with Ms. Heavner's first grade students.

img.alt: Group photo of the artists that created the Brian Shaw mural and members of the Arnold Police.

figcaption.p: Artists of the Brian Shaw Mural.

img.alt: Aerial photo of Valley Jr. Sr. High school

figcaption.p: Aerial view of Valley Jr/Sr High School, New Kensington Arnold School District

div.div: Everyday, we empower each of our students to reach their individual potential, learn to respect themselves and others, and to become lifelong learners.

The mission of the New Kensington-Arnold School District, a vibrant and inviting centerpiece of the community, is to ensure that each student is prepared, inspired, and motivated to be a successful contributing citizen of an ever-evolving global society by engaging and challenging students with personalized instruction, teaching excellence, innovative technology, and high expectations for superior academic achievement while embracing our unique traditions, heritage, and diversity in a safe, nurturing, student-centered environment.

video.alt: Police helping students fish in Valley High School creek.

div.div: Location: Valley Jr. Sr. High School Board Room 703 Stevenson Blvd. New Kensington, PA 15068
Location: Valley Jr. Sr. High School Board Room 703 Stevenson Blvd. New Kensington, PA 15068

article.aria-label: April 28, 2020 Committee of the Whole and General Meeting

h3.a: April 28, 2020 Committee of the Whole and General Meeting

div.div: The School Board will hold a virtual Committee of the Whole meeting beginning at 6:00 PM followed by a voting General meeting.

img.alt: UPDATE (3/19/20) School Meal Program Featured Photo

div.div: UPDATE (3/19/20) School Meal Program to Continue at Multiple Arnold and New Kensington Locations During the School Closure
Information about the Safe2Say Something program has been added to the Student Resources Page of the District Website
